synopsis.text: As Wataru Minakami, a former top-performing middle school student, finds his life upended when a computer glitch leads to his failure in the high school entrance exam, he is sent to the enigmatic Promised Island to attend Stargazer Hill Academy. Upon his arrival, he is greeted by a bevy of charming girls, only to discover they are all his adopted younger sisters. With twelve sisters and a mysterious reason behind their presence on the island, Wataru must navigate his new life and uncover the secrets that lie within. As he bonds with his siblings, Wataru embarks on a heartwarming journey of growth and self-discovery, all while yearning for his old life in Tokyo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
